reviewerName: Steven P. Gross "Good friend, cynical but tho...
reviewtext: Since I was out of internal bays and I still needed a Zip drive for my PC, I purchased the Portable USB model and it has worked just fine.  No glitches in either the installation or operation.  I don't quite get the  translucent blue case (oh yeah, it works with the Mac, too) but other than  that, no complaints.  Now that is high praise, indeed, these days!
